title: The Best Resident Evil Game DECIDED! (Almost)
description: With the fervor over Resident Evil Village, the gang gathers to figure out whether they can narrow down the very best Resident Evil game of all time. Sure, there's a lot of crud to sift through, but there's gold in these hills! And they're gonna buy shotgun upgrades with this gold!
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
